data.text: @elena_audry @people Point taken. I didn't get the same message from the letter, that's all. Did you see tweet his ex-wf sent of their precious daughter & her performance over the wknd? Very moving!Thx for the "discussion". I wish you well.

@elena_audry @people that space that didn't allow him to call down to his best friend, who was in the same hotel at the time to say, "I'm in a bad place." Part of the article cites how it's different for men/women, esp men in his age category.

@elena_audry @people There is an article in Psychology Today that I posted yesterday where a professional stated that often it's a case of "situational depression" or temporary "despair" & maybe b/c he had a grueling schedule, was a recovering addict (thus old coping mechanisms out) but fell into the

@elena_audry @people No! Of course not! I don't believe for one second that's what she was saying! In fact, she did not say the equivalent. Please don't project the message that she did. I'll bet you anything, his daughter won't blame Asia or her father.

@elena_audry @people My apologies for snapping for you to "get over yourself." I just believe more compassion is what is needed in our society in areas such as this, and if it can't be found--say nothing.
@elena_audry @people Seriously? That's what you got from reading that? Must be nice to have lived a life and remained so pristine. Get over yourself.
